    07.05.2011

  2. 124/365: Saint George's Works

    07.05.2011

    This one was kind of ruined by the car, but it's the only thing I managed to get on Wednesday, so it'll have to do.

  3. 123/365

    07.05.2011

    My King of Limbs newspaper album arrived on Tuesday.

    In other news, I've recently remembered how much I like Silent Alarm by Bloc Party. It's a bit too long, but when it's good, it's fantastic. Especially the drums.

  4. 122/365

    04.05.2011

    Went to Ragley Hall for a picnic, only to find ourselves in the middle of a pro-hunting fair. Great.

  5. 121/365: Puppy

    03.05.2011

    On Sunday we met Tilly, Steph's sister's new cavapoo puppy.

    In case you hadn't noticed, she's a very sleepy dog. We were only there for about an hour and she fell asleep on 4 separate occasions. Not that I have anything to compare that to, for all I know that's normal for 9-week-old puppies.

  6. 120/365: The Fly II

    30.04.2011

    At first I thought it might be cheating to have 2 photos in a row of the same thing, but then I remembered that I make the rules for this 365, and it's not.
